channel.title: Easy one for many people i guess, please help! :3
channel.description:
So i'm a noobie and i want to try coding a little bit, i got some experience but not many ;p.
So, this is my problem:
I found an awesome server at the 'server downloads' section, and i downloaded it all, but now i have 2 problems: -where the hell do i have to put these cache? (usually you have to put it in the data folder but there are so many other stuffs in there) -and how do i change the ip from the client so i can get on it?
(http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,547401.0.html) link of the server, i guess you need to look at it to answer my question ;p
I'd be the happiest guy in the world if someone could help me now :3

item.title: Easy one for many people i guess, please help! :3

item.description:
@k1ng0frs wrote:

i already told you what do [quote=“k1ng0frs, post:4, topic:447701”]search for

and change it to 127.0.0.1[/quote]in the client

Read full topic
